title: European Leaders Address Migrant Crisis In Mediterranean
teaser: European leaders say they have come up with a plan in response to the flood of migrants crossing the Mediterranean sea from Africa. If the death toll is confirmed in the latest tragedy Sunday, as many as 1,800 people have died making the perilous crossing to Europe so far this year.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
